trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> methods to provide access to output parameters, return values, and exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>metoder for å gi tilgang til utdataparametere, returverdier og unntak som er registrert ved hjelp av metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: These are accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil bli brukt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing that is required.
trans-unit.target: Ved å legge til en representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>hendelser, kan du se disse dataene og utføre flere etterbehandling som kreves.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen viser mange hendelser som kan håndtere, for å fungere med det underliggende objektet business på ulike tidspunkter i livssyklusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser og det tilknyttede <xref:System.EventArgs>klasser og hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | EventArgs kan | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Skjer umiddelbart før forekomsten av business-objektet er opprettet. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Skjer umiddelbart etter at forekomsten av business-objektet er opprettet. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før data som hentes. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før en insert-, update eller delete-operasjonen utføres. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter at dataene er hentet. | ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter insert-, update eller delete-operasjonen er fullført. | ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før en business-objekt er ødelagt. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified output parameters and return value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av de angitte Utdataparameterne og returverdi.

trans-unit.source: The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method.
trans-unit.target: Den `returnValue` parameteren kan være et objekt som er returnert av et kall til metoden business objektet data.

trans-unit.source: The `outputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: Den `outputParameters` parameteren er en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>samling navn/verdi-par som samsvarer med de som finnes i Metodesignaturen og sendes som referanse.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a return value for the completed database operation.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer en returverdi for databaseoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs of parameter objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-par parameter-objekter.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified output parameters, return value, and exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av de angitte Utdataparameterne, returnerer verdi, og unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method.
trans-unit.target: Den `returnValue` parameteren kan være et objekt som er returnert av et kall til metoden business objektet data.

trans-unit.source: The `outputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: Den `outputParameters` parameteren er en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>samling navn/verdi-par som samsvarer med de som finnes i Metodesignaturen og sendes som referanse.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The `exception` parameter is an <xref:System.Exception> exception that wraps any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control during a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Den `exception` parameteren er en <xref:System.Exception>unntak som bryter unntak som er registrert ved hjelp av metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen under en Dataoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If the exception is not handled by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> method, it is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control after the data operation returns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis unntaket ikke behandles av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>metoden, er det et av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollerer når Dataoperasjonen returnerer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a return value for the completed database operation.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer en returverdi for databaseoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs of parameter objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-par parameter-objekter.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that wraps any internal exceptions thrown during the method call.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som bryter internt unntak under metodekallet.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows that are affected by the data operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall rader som påvirkes av Dataoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows value to verify that the expected number of rows was affected.
trans-unit.target: Bruk verdien AffectedRows for å kontrollere at det forventede antallet rader ble påvirket.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the data operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av Dataoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control during a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tekstbryting for unntak som er registrert ved hjelp av metoden kalles av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kontroll under en data-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> exception does not represent the actual exception that is thrown by the business object data method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception>unntak representerer ikke det faktiske unntaket forårsakes av metoden business objektet data.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to access the thrown exception.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>til å få tilgang til thrown unntaket.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that wraps any exceptions thrown by the business object in its <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som bryter unntak av business-objektet i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was thrown by the business object has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et unntak som oppstod business-objektet har blitt behandlet.

trans-unit.source: If the business object throws an exception, the ExceptionHandled property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis business objektet oppstår det et unntak, ExceptionHandled-egenskapen er satt til `false` og unntaket brytes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler> object, you can check the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property and handle the exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>objektet, kan du kontrollere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen og referansen unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception, set the ExceptionHandled property to `true` or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du håndtere unntaket, angi ExceptionHandled egenskapen `true` eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen vil Iverksett et unntak.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an exception thrown by the business object has been handled and should not be thrown by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et unntak av business-objektet er håndtert og bør ikke bli utløst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder business objektet, og de tilhørende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Any parameters that are passed to the business object method by reference are returned in the OutputParameters collection.
trans-unit.target: Parametere som er sendt til metoden business objektet som referanse returneres i OutputParameters-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer business objektet metodeparametere og de tilhørende verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets the return value that is returned by the business object method, if any, as an object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den returnerte verdien som er returnert av metoden objektet eventuelt som et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The ReturnValue property is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> constructor.
trans-unit.target: ReturnValue-egenskapen er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The value is set to the return value of the business object method call, which is called using reflection.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er satt til returverdien for business objektet metodekallet, som kalles ved hjelp av gjenspeiling.

trans-unit.source: If the business method returns no value (such as when the business object method returns `void`), the ReturnValue property evaluated to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden business returnerer ingen verdi (for eksempel når business objekt returneres `void`), egenskapen ReturnValue evalueres til `null`.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the return value returned by the business object method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the business object method returns no value.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den returnerte verdien som ble returnert av metoden business objektet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis metoden business objektet returnerer ingen verdi.
